channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Francis Ngannou Names His Next Targets For Return To Boxing
item.description: Francis Ngannou is set to fight Renan Ferreira in his PFL debut on Saturday, October 26, but he is already eyeing opponents for a return to boxing.

item.title: Rony Abovitz Launches AI Startup SynthBee With $20 Million Seed Funding
item.description: The founder of Magic Leap and before it MAKO surgical, annouced the launch of an AI start-up to tackle hard AI problems with ethical solutions.

item.title: The interaction cascade
